verses.1: Elihu in a thugen zom lai a,
verses.2: “Lungduai takin tawm khat hong ngai lai in. Pasianʼ tangin ka gen ding thu pawl khat om lai hi.
verses.3: Kei a hong Piangsak Pasian thuman hi, ci-in kong lah nadingin thu tampi tak kaikhawmin kong gen ding hi.
verses.4: Ka thugente khempeuh a khial om het lo a, na mai ah thugen pa pen mipil khat ahi hi.
verses.5: “Pasian a thahat mahmah hi napi-in, kuamah simmawh lo hi. Amah in a theih loh bangmah om lo hi.
verses.6: Amah in mimawhte daupaisak lo a, a zawng gimna a thuakte tungah a manin a gamta hi.
verses.7: Amah in thuman mite hu a, kumpi ukna za zong pia a, pahtawina lianpi a ngahsak tawntung hi.
verses.8: Ahi zongin mite sikkol kibulh a, a gamtatna sate hangin gimna a thuak uh leh,
verses.9: Pasian in amauʼ mawhna le a kiphatsaknate uh a lak khia ahi hi.
verses.10: A gamtat siatna panun a khawl nadingun amauʼ bil sungah thu a gengen hi.
verses.11: Amaute in Pasianʼ thu mangin ama na sem le-uh amaute nuamsa-in a khan uh a sau hi.
verses.12: Ahi zongin ama thu mang kei le-uh, namsau tawh si ding uh a, misiteʼ gam zuan ding uh hi.
verses.13: “Migilote a hehin ni tum uh a, gimna a thuak ciang nangawnun ama huh ding ngen lo uh hi.
verses.14: Amaute khansih uh a, a zumhuaipi-in a bei uh hi.
verses.15: Ahi zongin Pasian in gimna tawh mite thuhilh a, khua a phawk theih nadingun gimna a zang ahi hi.
verses.16: Pasian in lungkhamna panin nang hong paikhiat pihin, lungnuam takin nang hong omsak a, na sabuai tungah an lim nono kilui venvan hi.
verses.17: Ahi zongin tu-in na ngah dinga kilawm gimna a thuak ta na hi hi.
verses.18: Sumgolhʼ khem sa-in gamta kei inla, leitung nateʼ bawlin lam kipialsak kei in.
verses.19: Huh ding na nget hangin a phattuamna om nawn lo a, na hauhna na liatna in hong huh thei nawn lo hi.
verses.20: Mihingte a bei mang hun ding, zan khuamial hong tun hun ding lunggulh kei in.
verses.21: Siatna lamah na kihei khak lohna ding limtakin kidawm in. Na siat khak loh nadingin gimna hong kithuaksak ahi hi.
verses.22: “Pasian a vangliat mahmahna limtakin phawktel in. Pasian pen sia khempeuh lakah sia lian pen ahi hi.
verses.23: Pasianʼ gamtatzia ding kuamah in sawl thei lo a, Pasian gamtat sia hi, ci-in kuamah in zong mawhsak zo lo hi.
verses.24: Pasian a nasepna hangin mi khempeuh in a phat tawntung mah bangin nang zong amah phat zaw in.
verses.25: Mi khempeuh in Pasianʼ sep sate mu uh a, thei kim zo lo uh ahih manin lamdang a sa uh hi.
verses.26: Pasian a liatna a kicingin i thei zo kei a, ama kum phazah zong i sim zo kei hi.
verses.27: “Amah in tuipi panin tuite la to a, tua a lak tuite guahtui-in a bawl hi.
verses.28: Amah in meii sung panin guah piangsak a, mihing khempeuh adingin guah a zusak hi.
verses.29: Meiite a pai henhanna hitaleh, vanah van a ginna hitaleh kuamah in thei zo lo hi.
verses.30: Amah in vantungah khua phiasak a, ahi zongin tuipi thuk sung a mialsak hi.
verses.31: Amah in tu-a bangin mihingte hong vak a, annek ding tampi tak a hong pia ahi hi.
verses.32: Amah in keek thu pia a, a kap nop penpen a kha dingin a sawl hi.
verses.33: Amah a heh ciangin huihpi sam a, vanging pen ama hong pai nading a kitheihna ahi hi.
